notes: Session 5 complete: Implemented FR-010, FR-011, FR-012 (/invite command). Changes: (1) Added AddMember method to GroupSimService interface, (2) Implemented handleInviteCommand() in repl.go to add users to group, (3) Handles already-member error by checking error message, (4) Validates empty user ID with usage message, (5) Trims whitespace from user ID, (6) No profile creation triggered for invited users (FR-011). Tests added for AC-010 (invite success), AC-011 (invite without profile), AC-012 (invite existing member), plus edge cases for empty user ID, whitespace, and 1-on-1 mode unavailability. All preflight checks pass. Next session should focus on FR-014-FR-017 (/invite-bot command and bot message handling).
